summary: Adds 13 Spears based on original weapon types(daedric, ebony, dwarven, etc)
descriptionHtml:
Hey guys!
This mod adds 13 Spears based on original weapon types(daedric, ebony, dwarven, etc), both ranged & melee.
all of these are craftable. melee spears are enchantable, but as of now, no upgrading works.
this is my third mod.
List of spears:-
RANGED Axe
RANGED Daedric
RANGED Dwarven
RANGED Ebony
RANGED Elven
RANGED Hammerfell
RANGED Orcish
MELEE Daedric
MELEE Dwarven
MELEE Ebony
MELEE Elven
MELEE Hammerfell
MELEE Orcish


like i said, all of these are craftable. melee spears are enchantable, but as of now, no upgrading works.
author: Daren
